text: 6.11: Ef 2.2; Kor 3.7; Ta 3.3-7; Hi 10.22Nde mbari fhum mba khesharigi tɨvi ga mbui gumgi kegi. Nde maaŋ muuŋgiap kim, Fhe Bakɨme nde ndigap, nde ruagim, nde ana gumgi gu mbigi guari ki. Nde ntigem, Guma Bakɨme Zisas Krais, nde ana zɨn panan, nde Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ŋkasŋkar panan, Fhe Bakɨme nde muuŋgim, nde ntigem ana rɨmani nɨman, nde tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi ki.
